ComicInfo.Title: Possibilities; Tuesday; Lady Anime; Walking Papers; No Spider Blues; Tunnel of Love; Love at First Slaughter
ComicInfo.Summary:
SEVEN KILLS IN SEVEN DAYS!
Written by Rob Liefeld, Cullen Bunn, Cody Ziglar, Marc Guggenheim, Justina Ireland and Gail Simone
Art by Rob Liefeld, Greg Land, Whilce Portacio, David Baldeon and Philip Sevy
Welcome to a week in the life of Wade Wilson, the best mercenary Marvel's ever had (just ask him)!
From facing off with rival killers to top secret assassinations, DEADPOOL has a lot of work to do in this blood-soaked oversized issue full of fan-favorite creators past and future!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-04 16:10:30. [CVDB1029682]
